subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: The team today known as Lotus Renault GP is one of the great Formula One teams of the past 20 years, specializing in rising up from the ashes and recreating itself into a winner again.
snippet: The team today known as Lotus Renault GP is one of the great Formula One teams of the past 20 years, specializing in rising up from the ashes and recreating itself into a winner again.
